q_en: What is the material with the lowest remaining inventory?
gt:
Sure thing! Based on the latest data, the material with the lowest remaining inventory is:

| Material ID | Material Name |
|-------------|---------------|
| 5           | Silk          |

Looks like Silk is running low! ðŸ§µâœ¨ If you need more details or have any other questions, feel free to ask! ðŸ˜„

steps.sql: SELECT m.id, m.name FROM warehouse_material wm JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id ORDER BY wm.left_number ASC LIMIT 1;
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID and name with the lowest remaining inventory from the warehouse_material table
